scripts.triggerAllTest-webdriveruni-report: npm run triggerAllTest-webdriveruni && npm run mochawesome-merge
scripts.cypress-regression-webdriveruni: npm run delete-mochawesome-report && npm run delete-mochawesome-results && npm run triggerAllTest-webdriveruni && npm run mochawesome-merge
scripts.triggerAllTest-autostore-report: npm run triggerAllTest-autostore-dashboard && npm run mochawesome-merge
scripts.cypress-regression-autostore: npm run delete-mochawesome-report && npm run delete-mochawesome-results && npm run triggerAllTest-autostore && npm run mochawesome-merge
scripts.mochawesome-merge: npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.cypress-regression-pack: npm run delete-mochawesome-report && npm run delete-mochawesome-results && npm run triggerAllTest-headless && npm run mochawesome-merge
